article_title: County officials to repeat DUI offenders: SCRAM
article_text: Gil Smart is a Lancaster Newspapers investigative reporter and columnist. He also blogs about politics at Smart Remarks. He can be reached at gsmart@lnpnews.com or (717) 291-8817. You can also follow @GilSmart on Twitter.
